about_the_game:
The Year is 2050. Tokyo. Neon signs cast a glow over towering skyscrapers, where corporations hold immense power and the Yakuza control the shadows. Akihito, haunted by his past, stumbles upon a sinister plotthat threatens to enslave the minds of the city.

Unravel the Conspiracy:

Embark on a thrilling 2D top-down shooter through an alternative futuristic cyberpunk Tokyo. Unleash your revenge as you discover the dark secrets lurking beneath the city's neon glow.

Key Features:
Fast-Paced Combat: Unleash a barrage of bullets and engage in brutal combat with a satisfying arsenal of weapons. Experience the violence firsthand as you take down your enemies in a hail of gunfire and bone-crunching takedowns.
A Glitch in the System: Explore a captivating narrative that blends mind control, memory loss, and the struggle for humanity in a cybernetic age.
Unveil the Secrets of Tokyo: Uncover a web of corruption involving the Yakuza, and a rogue government group.

Tokyo is a perfect blend of action-packed combat and a suspenseful storyline. Do you have what it takes to fight back against a tide of oppression and reclaim your memories and honor?

name: Tokyo Trigger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 256MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 8 or above
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Tokyo 2050 glows with neon, but darkness simmers beneath. Akihito, a warrior with a fractured past, uncovers a plot threatening the city. Blast through a top-down cyberpunk world in this fast-paced 2D shooter. Can you fight back against the tide of oppression and reclaim your memories and honor?
